moreBlocks.articles:
• Automobile Accidents
    Automobile accidents such as car crashes, truck accidents, motorcycle accidents, pedestrian injury and bicycle accidents remain a significant source of injury and litigation in the sphere of personal injury law.
  • Nursing Home Neglect
    As more elderly people rely on skilled nursing facilities for their care, staffing levels are typically insufficient to meet patient needs commonly resulting in episodes of avoidable injury and mistreatment.
  • Medical Malpractice
    An alarming 10% of all deaths in the United States are attributable to medical errors made by doctors and hospital staff. When an error is made, patients or their families may pursue a medical malpractice lawsuit.
  • Workers Compensation
    Any person injured in the course of their employment is entitled to various medical and financial benefits under the applicable law.
  • Premises Liability
    A poorly maintained or dangerous condition at home or business may give rise to a legal claim for resulting injuries.

description:
Rosenfeld Injury Lawyers LLC is committed to obtaining the best possible results for each client. We appreciate the impact that a serious injury or death has on the individual and his or her family and concentrate our efforts to maximize the recovery to the fullest extent of the law in Illinois.

Our attorneys have experience handling a diverse range of personal injury and professional negligence cases so you can rest assured that your case is being handled by a seasoned professional and extensive support staff with medical and nursing experts.

The breadth of our law practice enables us to draw from experience as well as solid relationships with experts in the fields of medicine, economics, vocational training, nursing and rehabilitation to present the most favorable case in court or during settlement discussions.

Many of our current and former cases involve motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, nursing home neglect, work accidents (construction site accidents, factory accidents, workers compensation), premises liability, products defects and wrongful death.

We are intentionally selective with the cases that we handle in order to commit the resources necessary to provide for the best possible outcome for each client. The selectivity of course means that you have direct access to your attorney when have questions or concerns about your case. Each phone call or email message is returned within 24 hours.

We recognize that the time following an injury-related accident can be a very stressful time, filled with uncertainly about the physical and financial impact of an injury. Our goal to shoulder the burden of dealing with insurance companies and defense attorneys so you can focus on your personal needs and the process of recovery.

Contact the Chicago Accident Law Firm You Want

From the time an incident occurs, insurance companies act to secure information that may be used to help defend against their insured. The team at Rosenfeld Injury Lawyers LLC recognizes this and takes the steps necessary to secure the evidence needed to build a favorable case for you. We have access to accident investigators who are available around the clock to secure the information needed to win your case.

We welcome you to contact our office to discuss your legal rights and options for pursuing a claim or lawsuit to recover compensation for your injuries. You can reach Rosenfeld Injury Lawyers LLC at 847-835-8895 or toll-free at 888-424-5757. Our lawyers can discuss your case with you at our Chicago office or at your home or hospital room. We are pleased to serve people across Illinois.

Rosenfeld Injury Lawyers LLC has attorneys and staff who are fluent in Spanish and Russian.
